title: Microsoft Search: Message vertical in Office.com now available in DoD
description: Looking for a message, but you can't remember whether it was in Teams or Outlook? Search for it in Office.com and then go to the Messages Tab. You'll get both Teams and Outlook messages in the list of results. Now available in DoD. This item is inaccurate and will be removed from the roadmap. We apologize for the inconvenience.
